definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: It is also continuously and augmentative for the own pressure and weight .
sentences.chinese: 给自己的压力和分量也是不停的增加的。

sentences.english: For an extra dose of antioxidants, have a glass of red wine on the side.
sentences.chinese: 为了一个额外分量的抗氧化剂，另外再加一杯红酒。

sentences.english: Subsequent portions of pitta bread were charged for.
sentences.chinese: 然后皮塔饼面包般的分量还要收费。

sentences.english: "Abe of the Potentilla cryptottaeniae" the secondary roles also similarly have the component.
sentences.chinese: 《狼牙之阿布》的班底也同样有分量。

sentences.english: When the plants could be seen having just one drink, all the subjects drank similar amounts.
sentences.chinese: 当安插者刚喝一杯的时候，所有人也都喝一杯的分量。

sentences.english: Subscripts Z and E are for zonal and eddy components respectively.
sentences.chinese: 下角标Z和E分别表示纬向分量和旋涡分量。

sentences.english: Subscripts Z and E are for zonal and eddy components respectively.
sentences.chinese: 下角标Z和E分别表示纬向分量和旋涡分量。

sentences.english: And the energy of the eastern component is mostly increased with time-variation.
sentences.chinese: 东向分量的能量随时间的变化以增加为主。

sentences.english: The one today is for integrating the normal component of F.
sentences.chinese: 今天这个是用来求F的法向分量的积分的。

sentences.english: Biggest of all are carbonated soft drinks, 70% of which are caffeinated.
sentences.chinese: 分量最大的还是碳酸软饮料，70%都含有咖啡因。

sentences.english: The crux of the algorithm comes in determining whether a node is the root of a strongly connected component.
sentences.chinese: 算法的关键是判断一个结点是否是强连通分量的根。

sentences.english: The bathymetric variation consists of a slowly varying component and a fast, small amplitude varying component.
sentences.chinese: 其中的地形变化包括慢变分量和小振幅快变分量。

sentences.english: The bathymetric variation consists of a slowly varying component and a fast, small amplitude varying component.
sentences.chinese: 其中的地形变化包括慢变分量和小振幅快变分量。

sentences.english: She had two generous helpings of pie .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了两个分量很足的馅饼。

sentences.english: The focal mechanism is mainly left-lateral strike-slip, with a small thrust component.
sentences.chinese: 震源机制主要是左旋走滑，带有很小的逆冲倾滑分量。

definition: standard weight (used on a balance scale)
it goes without saying/it is self-evident
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
